channel.title: Kubernetes on IYP UK

item.title: Getting Started With Kubernetes
item.description: Let’s get started with Kubernetes and play around with it locally. Foreword This article is largely inspired by the official Kubernetes getting started guide. What is minikube? Minikube is a tool that makes it easy to run Kubernetes locally. Minikube runs a single-node Kubernetes cluster inside a VM on your laptop for users looking to try out Kubernetes or develop with it day-to-day. Installation Full instructions can be found on minikube installation guide
